recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Spread tomato sauce over rolled-out pizza dough. Top with mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves. Drizzle olive oil and bake at 220°C (425°F) for 10-15 minutes.

recipes.name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
recipes.description: Cook quinoa according to package instructions. Arrange cooked quinoa, chickpeas, sliced avocado, and kale in a bowl. Drizzle with lemon tahini dressing before serving.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Cook spaghetti until al dente. Sauté bacon until crispy. Mix eggs and parmesan cheese in a bowl. Combine hot pasta, bacon, and egg mixture. Toss well and season with black pepper.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Heat oil in a pan. Add chopped vegetables and stir-fry until tender. Add soy sauce and grated ginger. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes and serve.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Chop romaine lettuce and toss with croutons. Add grated parmesan cheese and drizzle with Caesar dressing. Mix well before serving.

recipes.name: Vegan Lentil Soup
recipes.description: Sauté onions, carrots, and celery until softened. Add lentils and vegetable stock. Simmer for 20-25 minutes until lentils are tender. Season to taste.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
recipes.description: Sauté onions and garlic until fragrant. Add chicken pieces and cook until browned. Stir in curry powder and coconut milk. Simmer for 20 minutes and serve with rice.

recipes.name: Vegetarian Lasagna
recipes.description: Layer lasagna noodles with ricotta cheese, spinach, and tomato sauce in a baking dish. Top with mozzarella cheese and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 30-35 minutes.

recipes.name: Vegan Pancakes
recipes.description: Mix flour, almond milk, baking powder, and vanilla extract into a smooth batter. Pour onto a heated non-stick pan and cook until bubbles form. Flip and cook the other side. Serve with maple syrup.

recipes.name: Grilled Steak
recipes.description: Season steak with salt, pepper, and olive oil. Grill on high heat for 3-5 minutes per side, depending on desired doneness. Rest for a few minutes and serve with garlic butter.
